PartnerFundClaim.name: PartnerFundClaim
PartnerFundClaim.description: Represents a claim of funds from the partner marketing budget by a channel partner.

AllocationId.description: ID of the partner fund allocation.

BudgetId.description: ID of the partner marketing budget.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of the fund claim.

RequestId.description: ID of the partner fund request.

Status.description: Status of the fund claim. Values are: Draft Approved Rejected Paid
